description: The department of national defense has a requirement to procure the quantity of 2 Municipal Sidewalk \
full_summary:
=====================================

### Municipal Sidewalk Tractor with Attachments Tender Call

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-246843/A
* **Tender Title**: Municipal Sidewalk Tractor with Attachments
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Closing Date**: May 7, 2024, at 2:00:00 PM EST
* **Location**: Gagetown, Canada

#### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites you to submit a proposal for the procurement of two (2) Municipal Sidewalk Tractors with Attachments. The tractors must be diesel-powered, four-wheel drive, and articulated. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the tractors to Gagetown within 120 days after the contract award.

#### Amendment Details

This tender call is subject to amendment. The following amendment details are applicable:

* Amendment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33186/en-w8476-246843-a-amendment-001.pdf
* Amendment 2: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33186/en-w8476-246843-a-amendment-002.pdf
* Amendment 3 (Questions and Answers): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33186/en_fr-w8476-246843-a-amendment-003---questions-and-answers.pdf

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

Notice is hereby given that the Department of National Defence intends to award a contract for the procurement of two (2) Municipal Sidewalk Tractors with Attachments. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any future procurement.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender call, please contact:

Mylène Faguy, DLP 5-3-2
mylene.faguy@forces.gc.ca
(999) 999-9999

Note: The contact information above is subject to change. It is the bidder's responsibility to verify the contact information prior to submitting a proposal.

This is just a sample output. I expect this to be rewritten and polished further with bullet points and more illustrative details if need be. Let me know if you'd like any further modifications.
